features: 【𝗦𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗿 & 𝗜𝗿𝗼𝗻 𝟮 𝗶𝗻 𝟭】This 2-in-1 steamer for clothes can be a normal iron or a steamer iron to meet different ironing needs. When you plug in the steamer without pressing the button, then you will get an iron. After pressing the button, you can use it as a steamer. It is highly recommended to use steamer mode which has a better effect than iron.

【𝗧𝗿𝗮𝘃𝗲𝗹 𝗘𝘀𝘀𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗶𝗮𝗹𝘀 & 𝗠𝘂𝘀𝘁 𝗵𝗮𝘃𝗲】This portable and lightweight iron for clothes is perfect for travel, vacation and outing use. With this mini steamer, you can always go out with a tidy outfit. You can put it into your suitcases and backpacks without taking up too much space. ( If you have plans travelling abroad, you can also use this steamer in other countries simply with a converter)

【𝟭𝟬𝟬𝟬𝘄 & 𝟱𝘀 𝗙𝗮𝘀𝘁 𝗛𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴】With 1000W high power, the steamer can iron clothes with constant temperature of 302°F. It only takes 5 seconds to warm up and 3 minutes to iron a shirt, which will be easy and effortless for you to iron clothes, curtains, bed sheets and so on. This steamer is truly a home essential and college apartment essential.

【𝗣𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 & 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲】The mini garment steamer with a foldable handle is convenient to store. And it is capable of both flat ironing and hanging ironing. With only 1.37 pounds and 6 inches of the longest side, it is comfy to hold and use. You won't feel tired or sore while ironing clothes for a long time with this steamer.

【𝗦𝗮𝗳𝗲 & 𝗦𝘂𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗔𝗹𝗹 𝗙𝗮𝗯𝗿𝗶𝗰𝘀】With the ceramic panel which is smooth and anti-scratch, this mini iron can effectively remove crease and wrinkle without damaging the fabric. And it is suitable and safe for all kinds of fabrics, such as organic fabrics, nylon blend, wool, cotton, linen and much more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TRAVEL ESSENSIALS & MUST HAVE This steamer iron is perfect for travel, vacation and outing use. Only 1.4lb weight & 6in length. You can easily put it into your suitcases and backpacks without taking up too much space. Besides, you can also use this steamer abroad simply with a converter.

UPGRADED FUNCTIONS This steam iron has a mini design, yet it packs a lot of power and functionality. It's upgraded as a 2-in-1 steamer iron, Compared to normal irons, Our steamer iron can cope with almost all fabrics, and has a better ironing effect with steam. With 1000W high power, the steam and panel can reach 302°F and it only takes 5s to heat up. You don't need to wait any more.
GREAT DESIGN Mini & lightweightHandle that can be rotated 180 degrees100ml capacity water tankHigh power, Fast heatingCan switch to steamer mode3s to eject steamExcellent ABS material

2 IRONING WAYS It is capable of both flat ironing and hanging ironing. With steam , it has a better ironing effect and can iron almost all fabrics. Garment Steamer Heat up quickly and have several jets to eject steam. it does good job in ironing your clothes. Powerful enough to remove wrinkles and stains from even the most stubborn clothes NOTICE PLEASE This iron panel will be very hot, it will take more than 50 minutes to cool, you can put it on the tray.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little steamer
reviews.reviewText: Works great and perfect small size for travel or someone with less space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best foryour clothes!
reviews.reviewText: I bought it because I was going to a wedding out of town and I didn't want my dress to be wrinkled. It is SO handy I love it! I use it for all my clothing now, it's fast and convenient

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact for travel
reviews.reviewText: Took a minute to figure out how to use this best. At first it seemed to take forever to steam a shirt. Figured out later after tilting it a certain angle that it worked much better. Also the steamer stays on while it's unplugged and jot in use. So be sure to unplug it. The heat protector doesn't do much and actually gets really really hot. I don't think it helps to cool it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works beautifully
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for vacation and it didn’t disappoint me. It’s better than all the others I’ve tried. It packs a punch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a small steamer for travel that would not take up much luggage space and would be effective removing wrinkles from shirts and scarves. This is so small I didn't think it would be as effective as my larger steamer so I was happily surprised when it is ready to steam almost immediately. It also puts out a strong burst so no need to go over wrinkles multiple times. The only downside is that the water reservoir is small (obviously it is a small unit so this is expected) so it does not steam for a long time. I am usually only steaming a couple things at a time when traveling so the steam duration does not bother me. This is so much better than using the iron in the hotel room that takes longer and is not good for delicate fabrics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Iron didn't work during travel
reviews.reviewText: The iron handle got very hot and was noisy. There was no streamer coming out, just water dripping out and trying to iron without the streamer didn't work either. I was not able to iron my clothes during my trip. I had to throw the iron in the trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Won't Travel Without this Product
reviews.reviewText: This product is so user friendly and easy to travel with. I even use it when I have to steam a dress at home. Love this and would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: I have only used it as an iron so far and it’s really great for quick wrinkle removing. I’ve used it on several satin-like clothing and it works great, I didn’t realize I could rotate the head to make it like a steamer until reading other people’s reviews. I am extremely satisfied with this little iron steamer. It’s also very cute and compact, perfect to bring for travel.
Excellent travel steamer. Works as powerful as my full size steamer. It is really light weight easy to use and compact for easy carrying in luggage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 15, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely gorgeous colours, however, the paper is VERY thin and does not crease well at all. Am only keeping them for the vibrant colours, but will make other use of them. Just not up to origami at all.
Correspond bien à la description est arrivé en bon état, dans les temps indiqué par le vendeur.
Just love this little clothes steamer! As soon as I plugged it in the steam when on! The 2 ways of the handle position is very practical. Small but very efficient!
It is small and easy to use. The colour is so beautiful. Good stuff for travel
